text: Paul Alo'o Efoulou (born 12 November 1983) is a Cameroonian professional footballer. He plays as a striker for CSO Amnéville. ==International career== Paul Alo'o made his debut for the Cameroon national football team on 28 March 2009 against Togo in a qualifier for the 2010 World Cup in South Africa.FIFA. "Match Report - Togo - Cameroon 1:0 (1:0)". 28 March 2009. Retrieved on 22 July 2013. He also played in three other qualifying matches for the same competitionFIFA. "FIFA Player Statistics: Paul ALOO". Retrieved on 22 July 2013. and the 2010 African Cup of Nations in Angola,BBC. "Cameroon omit defender Sebastien Bassong from squad". 23 December 2009. Retrieved on 22 July 2013. but was not included in Paul Le Guen's 23-man squad for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.FIFA. "2010 FIFA World Cup - Cameroon - Squad List".
